sentences.sContent: Using this approach, you can simplify some of the data extraction requirements for your views and supporting applications.
sentences.sContent_eng: Using this approach, you can simplify some of the data extraction requirements for your views and supporting applications.
sentences.sCn: 使用这种方法，您可以为您的视图和支持的应用程序简化一些数据提取要求。

sentences.sContent: The investigation and industrial application on direct extraction of uranium from coal ash by trinity amine are introduce.
sentences.sContent_eng: The investigation and industrial application on direct extraction of uranium from coal ash by trinity amine are introduce.
sentences.sCn: 介绍了用三脂肪胺从煤灰酸浸矿浆中直接萃取铀的试验与工厂应用结果。

sentences.sContent: If you do not specify anything for this clause, audit records from all databases in the instance are eligible for extraction.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you do not specify anything for this clause, audit records from all databases in the instance are eligible for extraction.
sentences.sCn: 如果该子句未指定任何内容，那么可以提取来自实例中任何数据库的审计记录。
